sendWishlistEmal.description: A global action that sends an email to a customer based on the state of their wishlist.

routes/index.jsx.description: This page is the main and only page of the frontend. It displays the default value for the frequenecy of which emails are sent to customers.

wishlist.description: This is the model that stores the wishlist items of the customers.

wishlistItem.description: This is the model that stores the items in the wishlist. It is a link between the wishlist record and variants.

install.description: This action creates a metafield definition for the wishlists (and wishlist items) that belong to a customer.

wishlist.description: This premission gives the ability for a customer to read, create and delete (only) their wishlists from the customer account UI extension.

wishlistItem.description: This premission gives the ability for a customer to read and delete (only) their wishlist items from the customer account UI extension.

webflow.title: Customer wishlists
webflow.description: Sell more by keeping your customers up to date on your store's items.
